WorkPlace.Name: Capra Robotics ApS
WorkPlace.Description: Capra Robotics ApS is a passionate innovative company in the development and commercialization of mobile outdoor robots. We have invented and patented a new type of mobile robot platform that enables a new generation of off-road outdoor mobile robots. We collaborate with several universities, robotics companies, and specialists.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Embedded software developer for mobile robots
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about developing embedded devices and want to utilize this passion in mobile robots? Do you want to work in a high-ceilinged, highly innovative company?

What is Capra Robotics

Capra Robotics is a start-up where we have invented and patented a new type of wheel frame with a unique feature set and abilities to overcome the challenges of outdoor mobile robotics. The wheel frame combines the best attributes of differential steering and Ackerman steering. We are a company with a high degree of innovation, we develop most of our subsystems in-house from power distribution to BLDC motor drivers and embedded computing. We are working hard on bringing our robot to market. We are looking for someone that can take our software to the next level.

How to become a part of Capra Robotics ApS

As an embedded software system developer you will be a part of the development department. You will be responsible for the software and the overall systems design in collaboration with the SW team. This includes control, optimization, multithreading handling, system development, test, and documentation.

We expect you to be experienced or passionate in most of this:

  • C++ (Preferably working with STL)
  • STM32 MCU family, STM32CubeMX (Preferable)
  • Systems design based on application requirements
  • State space control theory
  • BLDC motor drive systems
  • Communication protocols such as SPI, I2C, Ethernet (preferable), CAN, CAN Open
  • Docker (This is advantageous)
  • Build tools such as CMake

Professionally we expect

You have an engineering education and experience as an Embedded Software Engineer or similar. You have some years of experience in designing industrial-grade software. We expect you to be positive, open-minded, and self-driven, and that you want to develop yourself as a person and contribute with innovative solutions within the working area.

About you

As a person we expect you to be a pleasant and gifted person, willing to be a part of a work environment with a high innovation overlay, initiative, curious, a team player, self-motivated, passionate about the project, and willing to work for being a part of our team.

We offer

Lots of challenges and possibilities for professional and personal development, in a high-paced environment with quick decision making. Positive and close cooperation with others – both internally/externally. You will be working on equal footing with the other employees and with good opportunities for help and sparring.

If you have any questions: Please contact Bart or Niels on 70227707 or talents@capra.ooo.

Does, the above apply to you?  Do not hesitate to send a motivated application and CV soonest possible. Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis.
